price: Pretenden extinguir la luz de Dios con sus palabras, pero Dios hará que Su luz prevalezca aunque esto desagrade a los que se niegan a creer.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُطۡفِـُٔواْ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَيَأۡبَى ٱللَّهُ إِلَّآ أَن يُتِمَّ نُورَهُۥ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna an yuṭ'fiū nūra al-lahi bi-afwāhihim wayabā al-lahu illā an yutimma nūrahu walaw kariha al-kāfirūna
